casebody.data:
THE HOPE MUTUAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. JAMES F. SOULTER, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Monell, Curtis and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiff upon a promissory note. F. E. Dana, for appellant. Cephas Brainerd, for respondent. Judgment affirmed, with costs.

No opinion delivered.
